name: Wild Deer Sniper Hunter 2017
description:
There are currently ten levels in this deer hunting game of 2017 with advanced 3D effects. The game physics is so simple and easy to adapt. You have to select the level and read its mission to achieve, timer will help you completing the task in specified time. The game failed will appear with dialogue box related to the objectives you achieved. Head shot, leg shot, body shot and total cash details. Shoot the deer like a pro, develop to shot perfectly. Zoom in out feature, fire option, movement with touch control. As to prove yourself a best sniper shooter and 3D deer hunter. Practice it by unlocking all the locked one levels. Its environment and graphics seems so real. Hunting deer game 2017 is fast pace action game.
Download it to your phones and write us valuable feedback! Fun is guaranteed!

How to use:
• Tap to open deer hunting game
• Select any of the unlocked level
• Read the instructions properly
• Number of deer to be hunt available on top right corner
• Zoom in for better shooting results
• Control for movement in all directions
• Shooting gun fire available at right corner
• Level based game with 10 missions with slight changes
• Time scale available on top left corner
• Pause the game play
• Help instructions for each level
• Game physics of each level
• Head shot/ body shot according to the mission requirement
Features:
• Free to play
• Counter for time
• Objective of game well explained with each level
